name: scrumboard
description: A simple scrumboard application, implemented in React
author: Bran van der Meer <branmovic@gmail.com> (http://bran.name/)

scripts.build:dev: echo '[START] build:dev' && npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run css && npm run js && npm run react:dev && npm run img && npm run html && echo '[FINISH] build:dev'
scripts.build:dist: echo '[START] build:dist' && npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run css && npm run js && npm run react:dist && npm run uglify && npm run img && npm run html && echo '[FINISH] build:dist'
scripts.react:dev: cp node_modules/react/dist/react.js dist/js/react.min.js && cp node_modules/react-dom/dist/react-dom.js dist/js/react-dom.min.js
